title: Template: Software Engineer — Cdmx (es-MX)
html:
Template — Software Engineer in Cdmx (es-MX)

ATS‑ready template localized for es-MX. Use action verbs and quantify impact.

  • Optimized core module; reduced latency by 28%.
  • Built CI/CD; accelerated releases from weekly to daily.
  • Collaborated with cross‑functional teams to hit milestones.
